lines.text: The day after Pearl Harbor, MacLene bought a torpedo boat and gave it to the Navy!
Lucille. My friends call me Lucy.
How can someone spend $500 on candy?
He's spent it in places I've never heard of.
Honey, if I had his dough, I'd spend it in places HE'S never heard of.
What do you mean? Everybody goes to Niagara Falls.
Nobody whose anybody goes to Niagara Falls.
What were you like as a little boy?
Truthfully? I was scared to death.
That's the smartest thing you've done since you were born rich.
I'll get a job. I won't start at the bottom because it would be silly. But I won't start at the top because that would be unfair.
